item.title: Working With File System from PySpark
item.description: Working with File System from PySpark Motivation Any of us is working with File System in our work. Almost every pipeline or application has some kind of file-based configuration. Typically json or yaml files are used. Also for data pipelines, it is sometimes important to be able to write results or state them in a human-readable format. Or serialize some artifacts, like matplotlib plot, into bytes and write them to the disk.
